typeProperties.script:
parameters{
	Path as string ('fortune100_m.csv')
}
source(output(
		Id as short,
		rank as short,
		title as string,
		Previous_Rank as string,
		Revenues as double,
		Profits as double,
		Employees as integer,
		CEO as string,
		CEO_Title as string,
		Sector as string,
		Industry as string,
		Years_on_Fortune_500_List as string,
		City as string,
		State as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	wildcardPaths:[($Path)]) ~> source
source sort(asc(Revenues, true)) ~> SortE
SortE alterRow(deleteIf(trim(Previous_Rank)=='NA')) ~> AlterRowE
DerivedColumn split(Fortune500,
	disjoint: false) ~> ConditionalSplit1@(main, other)
AlterRowE derive(Fortune500 = Revenues > 4000) ~> DerivedColumn
ConditionalSplit1@main sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> sink
